verses.verse: <S%G1161><s%>In <S%G1722><s%> those <S%G1565><s%> days <S%G2250><s%> came <S%G3854><s%> John <S%G2491><s%> the Baptist <S%G910><s%>, preaching <S%G2784><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the wilderness <S%G2048><s%> of Judaea <S%G2449><s%>,
And <S%G2532><s%> saying <S%G3004><s%>, Repent ye <S%G3340><s%>: for <S%G1063><s%> the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of heaven <S%G3772><s%> is at hand <S%G1448><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> is he <S%G2076><s%> that was spoken <S%G4483><s%> of by <S%G5259><s%> the prophet <S%G4396><s%> Esaias <S%G2268><s%>, saying <S%G3004><s%>, The voice <S%G5456><s%> of one crying <S%G994><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the wilderness <S%G2048><s%>, Prepare ye <S%G2090><s%> the way <S%G3598><s%> of the Lord <S%G2962><s%>, make <S%G4160><s%> his <S%G846><s%> paths <S%G5147><s%> straight <S%G2117><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> the same <S%G846><s%> John <S%G2491><s%> had <S%G2192><s%> his <S%G846><s%> raiment <S%G1742><s%> of <S%G575><s%> camel's <S%G2574><s%> hair <S%G2359><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> a leathern <S%G1193><s%> girdle <S%G2223><s%> about <S%G4012><s%> his <S%G846><s%> loins <S%G3751><s%>; and <S%G1161><s%> his <S%G846><s%> meat <S%G5160><s%> was <S%G2258><s%> locusts <S%G200><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> wild <S%G66><s%> honey <S%G3192><s%>.

Then <S%G5119><s%> went out <S%G1607><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> him <S%G846><s%> Jerusalem <S%G2414><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> Judaea <S%G2449><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the region round about <S%G4066><s%> Jordan <S%G2446><s%>,
And <S%G2532><s%> were baptized <S%G907><s%> of <S%G5259><s%> him <S%G846><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Jordan <S%G2446><s%>, confessing <S%G1843><s%> their <S%G846><s%> sins <S%G266><s%>.

¶ But <S%G1161><s%> when he saw <S%G1492><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> of the Pharisees <S%G5330><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Sadducees <S%G4523><s%> come <S%G2064><s%> to <S%G1909><s%> his <S%G846><s%> baptism <S%G908><s%>, he said <S%G2036><s%> unto them <S%G846><s%>, O generation <S%G1081><s%> of vipers <S%G2191><s%>, who <S%G5101><s%> hath warned <S%G5263><s%> you <S%G5213><s%> to flee <S%G5343><s%> from <S%G575><s%> the wrath <S%G3709><s%> to come <S%G3195><s%>?
Bring forth <S%G4160><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> fruits <S%G2590><s%> meet <S%G514><s%> for repentance <S%G3341><s%>:

And <S%G2532><s%> think <S%G1380><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> to say <S%G3004><s%> within <S%G1722><s%> yourselves <S%G1438><s%>, We have <S%G2192><s%> Abraham <S%G11><s%> to our father <S%G3962><s%>: for <S%G1063><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> unto you <S%G5213><s%>, that <S%G3754><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> is able <S%G1410><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> these <S%G5130><s%> stones <S%G3037><s%> to raise up <S%G1453><s%> children <S%G5043><s%> unto Abraham <S%G11><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> now <S%G2235><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> the axe <S%G513><s%> is laid <S%G2749><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> the root <S%G4491><s%> of the trees <S%G1186><s%>: therefore <S%G3767><s%> every <S%G3956><s%> tree <S%G1186><s%> which bringeth <S%G4160><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> forth <S%G4160><s%> good <S%G2570><s%> fruit <S%G2590><s%> is hewn down <S%G1581><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> cast <S%G906><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the fire <S%G4442><s%>.

I <S%G1473><s%> indeed <S%G3303><s%> baptize <S%G907><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> with <S%G1722><s%> water <S%G5204><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> repentance <S%G3341><s%>: but <S%G1161><s%> he that cometh <S%G2064><s%> after <S%G3694><s%> me <S%G3450><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> mightier than <S%G2478><s%> I <S%G3450><s%>, whose <S%G3739><s%> shoes <S%G5266><s%> I am <S%G1510><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> worthy <S%G2425><s%> to bear <S%G941><s%>: he <S%G846><s%> shall baptize <S%G907><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> with <S%G1722><s%> the Holy <S%G40><s%> Ghost <S%G4151><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> with fire <S%G4442><s%>:

Whose <S%G3739><s%> fan <S%G4425><s%> is in <S%G1722><s%> his <S%G846><s%> hand <S%G5495><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> he will throughly purge <S%G1245><s%> his <S%G846><s%> floor <S%G257><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> gather <S%G4863><s%> his <S%G846><s%> wheat <S%G4621><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the garner <S%G596><s%>; but <S%G1161><s%> he will burn up <S%G2618><s%> the chaff <S%G892><s%> with unquenchable <S%G762><s%> fire <S%G4442><s%>.

¶ Then <S%G5119><s%> cometh <S%G3854><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> from <S%G575><s%> Galilee <S%G1056><s%> to <S%G1909><s%> Jordan <S%G2446><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> John <S%G2491><s%>, to be baptized <S%G907><s%> of <S%G5259><s%> him <S%G846><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> John <S%G2491><s%> forbad <S%G1254><s%> him, saying <S%G3004><s%>, I <S%G1473><s%> have <S%G2192><s%> need <S%G5532><s%> to be baptized <S%G907><s%> of <S%G5259><s%> thee <S%G4675><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> comest <S%G2064><s%> thou <S%G4771><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> me <S%G3165><s%>?

And <S%G1161><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> answering <S%G611><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> him <S%G846><s%>, Suffer <S%G863><s%> it to be so now <S%G737><s%> : for <S%G1063><s%> thus <S%G3779><s%> it becometh <S%G4241><s%> <S%G2076><s%> us <S%G2254><s%> to fulfil <S%G4137><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> righteousness. <S%G1343><s%> Then <S%G5119><s%> he suffered <S%G863><s%> him <S%G846><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%>, when he was baptized <S%G907><s%>, went up <S%G305><s%> straightway <S%G2117><s%> out of <S%G575><s%> the water <S%G5204><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%>, lo <S%G2400><s%>, the heavens <S%G3772><s%> were opened <S%G455><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> he saw <S%G1492><s%> the Spirit <S%G4151><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> descending <S%G2597><s%> like <S%G5616><s%> a dove <S%G4058><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> lighting <S%G2064><s%> upon <S%G1909><s%> him <S%G846><s%>:

And <S%G2532><s%> lo <S%G2400><s%> a voice <S%G5456><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> heaven <S%G3772><s%>, saying <S%G3004><s%>, This <S%G3778><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> beloved <S%G27><s%> Son <S%G5207><s%>, in <S%G1722><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> I am well pleased <S%G2106><s%>.
